name: Tongue Snatch
description: Leon takes French kissing a bit too serious, slapping his tongue in your face, grabbing you by the throat and pulling you towards him in one flying swing. Chicks go wild for it!
effects: damage: 120; damage multiplier: 2; cooldown: 7s; range: 6.6; travel speed: 60;

name: Cloaking Skin
description: As a great tactician, Leon knows the element of surprise can be very useful in combat. Using his natural stealth ability in combination with robotic dummies, he can fool anyone on the battlefield.
effects: cooldown: 10s; dummy health: 400; dummy lifespan: 18s; dummy attack: yes;

name: Slash
description: Our tailed rogue loves to stab people in the back, and there is one thing you need for that, a razorsharp lasersword. Also a great tool for making ratatouille.
effects: Damage: 80; Attack speed: 136; Range: 3.2

name: Reptile Jump
description: Being a reptile has its advantages. Strong leg muscles give Leon the ability to leap high into the air. His tail keeps him stable while mid-air, giving him an agile advantage over his enemies.
effects: health: 1250; Movement: 7.8; Health Per Min: 600; Height: 1.6; Pills: turbo; Jump Height: 7.6;

name: Dynamite Throw
description: Lonestar is a great fan of shooting things, but sometimes bullets just won't cut it. So to make sure it stays down, Lonestar will chuck cigar-lit sticks of dynamite at his foes!
effects: Damage: 140; Damage Multiplier: 3; Amount: 3; Explosion Size: 3.2; Time: 0.7s; Cooldown: 6s;

name: Summon Hyper Bull
description: To keep himself sharp, Lonestar trains with powerful holo-Bulls that knock anyone away. New fangled portable holo-tech allows him to turn his training program on his enemies!
effects: cooldown: 8s; speed: 8; health: 400; knockback: 1.2

name: Blaster
description: Even though it's a bit modern for his tastes, Lonestar has shot his way out of many a tight situation using his deadly and accurate space blaster!
effects: damage: 60; attack speed: 166.7; range: 7.2

name: Double Jump
description: Using the simple thrusters he integrated into his classic cowboy boots, Lonestar can do an extra jump in mid-air. Handy for traversing mountains of wrangled Bovinions!
effects: health: 1300; movement: 7.4; Health Per Min: 600; Pills: Turbo; Jumps: 2; Jump Height: 4.4;

name: Vacuum Bite
description: Being a giant robot requires a lot of energy. Luckily, Clunk has a powerful set of metal jaws that allow him to take a bite out of almost everything. His iron stomach takes whatever comes in, and quickly converts it to raw health.
effects: damage: 300; cooldown: 5s; Lifesteal: 100%; Range: 4.2;

name: Explode
description: Clunk was designed to be a suicide attacker, later fitted with armor powerful enough to survive his own explosion. Clunk now happily takes a bit of damage to blow away his enemies!
effects: damage: 500; self damage: 300; cooldown: 13.5s; Explosive Size: 9; Charge Time: 1.5s

name: Missiles
description: Slow-loading but very powerful: Clunks' missiles are very useful to get rid of obstructions when he just wants to blow up in someone's face.
effects: damage: 140; Attack speed: 60; range: 9.4

name: Jet Boost
description: Similar to white male humans, giant combat robots can't jump. To compensate, Clunk was outfitted with a powerful jet engine that lets him fly for short distances.
effects: health: 1900; Movement: 7.6; Health Per Min: 600; Pills: turbo; Jump Height: 12; Jump Duration: 1.1s;

name: Splash Dash
description: Harnessing his aquatic payload, Froggy launches himself with incredible velocity towards his foes. Dashing straight through multiple targets he leaves them stunned!
effects: damage: 250; cooldown: 7.5s; stun duration: 0.7s; self stun duration: 0.2s; Distance: 12.15;

name: Tornado Move
description: Froggy G can transform himself into a whirling waterspout of pain! While spinning madly, he damages everyone foolish enough to come near him!
effects: damage: 83; attack speed: 300; cooldown: 11.6s; duration: 1.6s; movement: 5.7

name: Bolt .45 Fish-gun
description: The Ribitian Spitfish (Spittious Maximus) is known for its ability to shoot jets of water near the speed of sound. Coaxed correctly, it makes for one lethal ally!
effects: damage: 60; attack speed: 133.3; range: 4.8

name: Frog Jump
description: Charging his waterpack, Froggy can leap higher than any frog has leaped before. The longer the charge, the higher the jump!
effects: health: 1150; movement: 8.4; Health Per Min: 600; pills: turbo; Jumps: 1; Jump Height: 10;

name: Acid Spit
description: Regurgitating leftovers from the trashcan at the local Nalconian Take-Away, Gnaw is able to barf up puddles of acidic goo that will burn unwary pedestrians for quite some time.
effects: Damage: 50; Damage over Time: 300; Damage duration: 9s; Damage Multiplier: 2; cooldown: 8s; time: 4s; range: 6; Heal: 20%;

name: Grow Weedling
description: Gnaw has a special gland that is able to produce Weedlings - weird, sentient, plant-like creatures. Once nurtured, they are deposited on the ground from where they procede to shoot Gnaw’s enemies.
effects: Parts: 5; Placement Damage: 200; Damage: 75; Attack Speed: 74.1; Health: 450; Starting health: 25%; Extra health: +52; Max health: +162; Health per min: 2000; Life time: 30s; Cooldown: 0.3s; Bullet Speed: 6; Weedlings: 4;

name: Bite
description: A Skroggle’s jaws are not to be trifled with. Able to bite through Toughasnailium in a single chomp, you’d better stay out of Gnaw’s yard if you value your limbs.
effects: damage: 70; damage over time: 100; damage duration: 5s; attack speed:130; range: 2.8;

name: Skroggle Jump
description: Getting fed up with interplanetary mailmen that kept climbing into space-trees to avoid his jaws, Gnaw learned to jump for his meals!
effects: Health: 1350; movement: 7.8; Health Per Min: 600; Pills: Turbo; Jump Height: 7.6;

name: Timerift
description: An expandable wall held within a nifty grenade! With this gadget, Raelynn can create some cover out of just about any terrain. Also great for blocking off annoying ex-es.
effects: Slowing Power: 65%; Damage: 19; Attack Speed: 150; Cooldown: 9s; Height: 3.5; Width: 2; Duration: 4s;

name: Snipe
description: Cuddles folds out to form a supercute variable Sniper-Pulserifle! Able to zap any target over great distances, the resulting beam will take out most of the surroundings along with the target. If you see a laser-point, best run!
effects: Damage: 450; Cooldown: 10s; Range: 17; Arming time: 0.6s; Knockback: 0.7;

name: Protoblaster
description: Cuddles all folded up into a widdle gun makes most go “d’awwww” upon seeing it. This reaction usually transitions smoothly into a highpitched scream as they find out what “cuddling” really means.
effects: Damage: 70; Attack Speed: 150; Range: 8;

name: Six Million Solar Human Jump
description: During bootcamp, recruits learned to traverse many obstacles and leap great distances. What made Raelynn special is the fact she was able to do all that in a pair of fancy heels as well as combatboots.
effects: Health: 1300; Movement: 7.4; Health Per Min: 600; Pills: Turbo

name: Mighty Throw
description: Always up for a Bear Hug, Skølldir never knew how to handle that awkward pause in the middle. His solution? Throw ‘m away! He ended up liking the throwing better than the hugging, so he stuck with that.
effects: knockback: -1.7; cooldown: 8s;

name: Earthquake
description: Putting on some weight made his buns of steel a force to be reckoned with. Planting them firmly on the ground after a daring leap shatters earth and enemies alike!
effects: Damage Over Time: 350; damage duration: 5s; cooldown: 8s; range: 9;

name: Bash
description: No man should ever come within reach of Skølldir’s best friends, Lefty ‘n Righty. Better known as his Fists of Fury, he is able to pummel enemies with a devastating 3-hit combo that’ll leave their ears ringing!

name: Explosive Fart
description: Able to channel his inner “strength”, Skølldir lets out a thunderous fart that lifts his bulk to new-found heights during a jump.
effects: health: 1600; movement: 7.4; Health Per Min: 600; pills: turbo

name: Suicide Drones
description: Because Voltar does a lot thinking he gets tired often. He is able to construct highly advanced robodrones to fight on his behalf.
effects: Summon Cooldown: 4s; Amount: 3; Damage: 20; Damage Multiplier: 3; Explosion damage: 150; Attack Speed: 100;

name: Healbot
description: Thinking is quite hard and exhausting. Voltar can construct a hightech healbot at his current location to assist him heal his allies, and to make life a little bit more easy.
effects: Heal: 450; Cooldown: 17s; Charge Time: 1.7s; Health: 200; Size: 20; Health Max: +51;

name: Techno Synaptic Wave
description: Voltar can shoot healing blasts at his allies. The longer the distance, the more the blast heals. Additionally these blasts deal damage to enemies.
effects: Heal: 20; Max Heal: 30; Attack Speed: 171.4; Range: 8.4; Damage: 40;

name: Hover
description: Voltar added some thrusters to his braintank, to allow him to hover above the ground and slow-fall while in midair.
effects: health: 1200; Movement: 7.6; Health Per Min: 600; Pills: Turbo; Jump Height: 7.4; Jumps: 1; Max Hover Duration: 5s;

name: Mine Deploying
description: What’s the use of a jetpack if all it can do is fly and warp space and time? Exactly, it needs explosions!
effects: Damage: 400; Cooldown: 4s; Time: 12s;

name: Warp Time
description: After his brain got zapped in the anomaly, Yuri managed to recreate parts of it inside his new fancy jetpack, allowing him to alter the flow of time in an area around himself.
effects: Cooldown: 10.5s; Duration: 3.5s; Size: 9.2; Slowing power: 30%;

name: Laser
description: Affixed on top of the jetpack is a deadly laser that is able to fire in a full circle with pinpoint precision. It is able to slice through multiple enemies and even bounce off walls to hit people around a corner!
effects: Damage: 30; Max Damage: 40; Attack Speed: 300; Range: 9; time to next charge: 0.5s; Pulls pickups towards you: Yes;

name: Jet Pack
description: The pride and joy of Yuri: it alters the flow of time, shoots laserbeams, drops mines, can insult enemies in over six million forms of communication and oh yeah, it can fly.
effects: Health: 1350; Movement: 8.2; Health Per Min: 600; Pills: Turbo;

name: Spike Dive
description: In many a mad dash to escape them flat-flooted coppers, Spike has specialised in a Dive that lets him torpedo through just about any roadblock. It delivers a lethal dose of spikes shot from his spine to add to the mayhem!
effects: Damage: 350; Cooldown: 8s; Radius: 6

name: Smoke Screen
description: Whenever Spike gets cornered, he squirts out a misty cloud that leaves everyone blinded in its wake. Vinnie has long since learned to use this nervous tick in his trusty pall to beat a hasty retreat when things get nasty!
effects: Cooldown: 11s; Duration: 4s; Size: 8; Blind Duration: 0.38s

name: Bubble Gun
description: The small difference between the bubbles shot from Spike’s mouth, and the gently tumbling soapy dreams we all adore from our childhood, is that Spike’s bubbles will take your arm off if you try to pop ‘m!
effects: Damage: 30; Damage multiplier: 3; Attack Speed: 85.7; Range: 7

name: Inflate
description: Being the smart guy that he is, Vinnie uses Spike’s ability to bloat his body and float around. Apart from a hilarious party trick, this will get the duo up to those hard to reach places for the choicest pieces of loot!
effects: Health: 1250; Movement: 6.8; Health Per Min: 600; Pills: turbo; Jump Height: 4;

name: Cocoon
description: Entin silk is not only very fashionble in some parts of the galaxy, but it's also one of the most sturdy materials around! Gurgling and spitting out a ball of the webbed silk, Genji can envelop his enemies in a cocoon, making them unable to attack or be attack for a short period of time.
effects: Cooldown: 9s; Duration: 2s; Range: 6

name: Monarch Blessing
description: Offering a prayer to the great and allmighty Space-Butterfly, Genji receives such a powerful blessing that it spills from his body to every nearby ally, wrapping them in a glowing blanket of protective goodness!
effects: Shield: 25%; Cooldown: 14s; Duration: 3; Range: 8

name: Butterfly Shot
description: Carrying the staff of the Popae office, Genji can shoot ethereal butterflies from its tip, sending them out in a flurry and making them return to cause another hit on their way back!
effects: Damage: 60; Damage multiplier: 2; Attack Speed: 75; Range: 7.4

name: Flutter Jump
description: Genji, as the chosen avatar to represent the Space-Butterfly in battle, is granted spectral wings to extend his jump for those crucial seconds that could mean the difference between life or a one-way ticket to the allmighty Bugzapper in the sky.
effects: Health: 1250; Movement: 8.4; Health Per Min: 600; Pills: Turbo;

name: Ball Lightning
description: Coco shoots an actual ball of lightning from her hands, which she can detonate at any time while it's traveling through the air. This little bundle of bolts is able to pass through any solid object.
effects: Damage: 400; Cooldown: 7s; Range: 8; Knockback: 1.5; Speed: 10;

name: Blaze
description: Leaving a trail of lightning, Blaze will damage anyone who is foolish enough to step into it. Helpful to get rid of “the man” when he’s persuing you about those unpaid bills.
effects: Damage Over Time: 150; Damage Duration: 2s; Cooldown: 8s; Length: 8; Time: 2s; Slowing Power: 10%; Slow Duration: 1s;

name: Shock
description: Coco channels her psycho-electric powers through her unfortunate enemies, frying anything foolish enough to stand in front of her. Machine or mammal, they are all in for a nasty shock.
effects: Damage: 25; Attack Speed: 428.6; Range: 3.3;

name: Ollie
description: Always willing to entertain the crowds and show off her skills, Coco will occasionally do a Front-Flip while soaring through the air.
effects: Health: 1250; Movement: 9.4; Health Per Min: 600; Pills: Turbo; Jump Height: 8; Frontflip Chance: 50%;

name: Grid Trap / Nuke
description: Deploy traps that will ensnare enemies, locking them in place. When in Siege Mode, this ability will fire a homing Nuke which can obliterate pretty much anything. Also good for toasting marshmallows.
effects: Trap arming time: 0.6s; Trap Cooldown: 6s; Trap lifetime: 11s; Snare Duration: 1.6s; Nuke Damage: 500; Nuke Cooldown: 14s; Explosion Size: 8; Nuke Range: 17.4; Nuke Speed: 6; Nuke Homing: 100;

name: Siege Mode
description: When the going gets tough, the tough get tougher! Transform the combat walker into a stationary siege turret of doom, brandishing a free rotating machine gun in the process.
effects: Cooldown: 1.5/4.5s; Damage: 90; Attack Speed: 240; Range: 9.2;

name: Cat Shot / Gatling
description: Mew enemies into oblivion by shooting explosive holocats. Derpl’s love of felines should be shared with everyone. When in Siege Mode, the cats take a break and the machine gun takes over.
effects: Damage: 80; Attack Speed: 100; Range: 9.8;

name: Booster Rocket
description: Derpl's walking desk has a temporary jet boost, lifting him up high to soar with the pink elephants of joy!
effects: Health: 1800; Movement: 7.2; Health Per Min: 600; Pills: Turbo; Jump Height: 8; Jump Duration: 0.8s;

name: Evil Eye
description: Unleash your third eye. The evil eye is more effective the less health you have.
effects: Damage: 300 > 400 > 500 > 600; Cooldown: 7.5s; Slowing Power: 7.5% > 15% > 22.5% > 30%; Slow duration: 2.5s; Range: 9.2; Health stages: 100% > 75% > 50% > 25%;

name: Rage
description: Toggles rage mode on/off, making Ayla float and deal heavy area damage.

name: Chain whack
description: Ayla swings the lock on her chain.
effects: Damage: 80; Attack speed: 150; Range: 2.6; Lifesteal: 20%;

name: Hop Skip
description: Ayla is awesome at skipping rope!
effects: Health: 1300; Movement: 7.6; Health Per Min: 600; Pills: Turbo;

name: Anchor Hook
description: Swiggins hurls Homboldt forward, if he hits an enemy or an wall he will fly to the target.
effects: Damage: 250; Flying damage: 100; Cooldown: 7s; Range: 11; Stun duration: 0.1s;

name: Anchor Drop
description: Swiggins throws Homboldt out, if he hits an enemy Awesomenaut he will be chained to Homboldt.
effects: Damage: 100; Cooldown: 11s; Duration: 3s; Homboldt health: 300; Homboldt health max: +150;

name: Anchor Swing / Ink Spray
description: Admiral Swiggins swings his trustworthy Homboldt or sprays corrosive ink.
effects: Anchor Damage: 110; Anchor attack speed: 95.2; Anchor range: 3.2; Ink damage: 70; Ink attack speed: 130.4; Ink range: 7.2;

name: Ink Propulsion
description: Flining himself upwards, Admiral Swiggins can perform thrusts in the air by shooting out ink.
effects: Health: 1500; Movement: 7.2; Health Per Min: 600; Pills: Turbo; Jump Height: 7.6; Max Hover Duration: 3s;

name: Airstrike
description: Shoot a flare that marks the location for a powerful airstrike. Only available when holding the machinegun
effects: Damage: 450; Cooldown: 10s; Range: 10;

name: Stimpack
description: Receive a temporary burst of attack speed but will do damage. Only available when holding the shotgun
effects: Attack Speed: +35%; Duration: 3s; Cooldown: 12s

name: Shotgun and Machine Gun
description: Ted can alternate between his shotgun and machine gun
effects: Shotgun Damage: 200; Shotgun Attack Speed: 48; Shotgun Range: 5; Shotgun Reload Time: 2s; Shotgun Knockback: 0.2; Shotgun Spread: 20°; Shotgun Ammo: 4; Machine Gun Damage: 40; Machine Gun Attack Speed: 352.9; Machine Gun Range: 7.5; Movement with machine gun: +0.8;

name: Jumppack
description: This marine can handle any assault course with his jumppack.
effects: Health: 1400; Movement: 7.6; Health Per Min: 600; Pills: Turbo; Jump Height: 8;

name: Pounce
description: Consume up to 4 charges to charge forward, knocking back enemies you come in contact with. Each charge increases range and damage.
effects: Damage: 150 > 200 > 250 > 300; Cooldown: 7s; Stun Duration: 0.4s; Range: 4.6; Range: 0.4 > 0.8 > 1.2 > 1.6; Knockback: 0.6 > 0.8 > 0.95 > 1;

name: Energy Pulse
description: Consume up to 4 charges to shoot a piercing energy pulse that amplifies damage. Each charge increases the damage.
effects: Damage: 100 > 200 > 300 > 400; Cooldown: 7s; Amplify damage: 10%; Ampilfy duration: 3.5s; Range: 5.5;

name: Claw
description: Penny strikes with her claw awarding a charge when hitting an enemy. Max 4 charges.
effects: Damage: 90; Attack Speed: 109.1; Range: 3.2; Max charges: 4;

name: Leap
description: Being super agile, Penny can leap up and perform a triple jump.
effects: Health: 1250; Movement: 8.8; Health Per Min: 600; Pills: Turbo; Jumps: 3; Jump Height: 9; Additional Jump Height: 4;

name: Black Hole Sun
description: Enables a damage collecting black hole that can be placed with a second press, pulling enemies toward it and dealing the collected damage.
effects: Converted Damage: 65%; Damage: 150; Maximum damage: 605; Shield: 20%; Shield Health: 700; Cooldown: 10s; Shield Duration: 2s; Black Hole Duration: 1.5s; Black Hole Growing Delay: 0.1s; Size: 10; Range: 6; Gravity: 4.67 > 9.3;

name: Teleport Beacon
description: Sentry deploys a beacon to which he can teleport. Sentry deals a damage dealing pulse at arrival.
effects: Damage: 100; Cooldown: 15s; Active after out of combat for: 2s;

name: Photon Mine Launcher
description: Warbots from the X-58 line come with a high powered photon mine launcher.
effects: Damage: 90; Attack Speed: 90.9; Time: 2s; Range: 6.8; Explosion Size: 3.4;

name: Energy Thruster
description: Standed warbot energy thruster, for short leaps in combat.
effects: Health: 1550; Movement: 6.8; Health Per Min: 600; Pills: Turbo; Jump Height: 8.4; Jump Duration: 0.6s;

name: Saw Blade
description: Shoot a spinning blade that stays in one position for a limited time. You can place it and pull it towards you by pressing the button again.
effects: Flying Damage: 200; Damage: 20; Attack Speed: 600; Cooldown: 10s; Range: 12.6; Time: 4.9s; Size: 4;

name: Totem of Power
description: Place a totem that has collision for enemies and can be stand on by friendly units.
effects: Cooldown: 14s; Health: 600; Health Max: +300; Height: 6; Width: 1.6; Duration: 7s; Area of Effect: 16;

name: Lightning Rod
description: Shoot lightning from your mechanical rod. Deals half damage to secondary targets.
effects: Damage: 60; Fork Damage: 30; Attack Speed: 100; Range: 7; Targets: 3; Spread: 60°;

name: Whirling Blades
description: Skree floats on a swirling set of blades, by holding the button he can stay on the same altitude in the air.
effects: Health: 1350; Movement: 8.2; Health Per Min: 600; Pills: Turbo; Jumps: 1; Jump Height: 10; Hover: Yes;

name: Frozen Hammer
description: Throw out a hammer of ice that snares multiple enemies. The longer it flies, the more damage you deal and the longer the snare lasts.
effects: Damage: 150 > 200; Cooldown: 7.5s; Snare duration: 0.4 > 0.8; Range: 17;

name: Binding of Justice
description: Wrap yourself in healing bindings which heal you and damage your enemies
effects: Damage: 170; Heal: 300; Cooldown: 13.5s; Explosion radius: 9; Charge time: 1s

name: Sword Strike
description: Scoop alternates between a direct slash and a sweeping cleave attack that heals you.
effects: Slash Damage: 100; Slash Range: 3.4; Cleave Damage: 60; Cleave Range: 3.9; Cleave Lifesteal: 20%; Attack speed: 120

name: Wobbling Jump
description: Being a gelatinous being helps in performing high wobbling jumps.
effects: Health: 1600; Movement: 7.2; Health Per Min: 600; Pills: Turbo; Jumps: 1; Jump Height: 7.8;

name: Orb of Omicron
description: Send out an orb to which you can teleport with a second press.
effects: Damage: 200; Cooldown: 7s; Range: 12.4; Speed: 18; Hold Position: 2s;

name: Fire Breath
description: Hold your position and unleash your fiery breath on your foes.
effects: Damage: 34; Non-Awesomenauts Damage: 17; Attack Speed: 1200; Cooldown: 10.5s; Duration: 1.5s; Range: 7.2;

name: Dragon Frenzy
description: Strike with your claws. Each hit will give a stack of frenzy, increasing your attack speed.
effects: Damage: 65; Attack speed: 133.3; Frenzy speed: +10.7% > +21.4% > +32.1% > +42.8%; Frenzy max stacks: 4; Frenzy duration: 3s; Range: 3.5;

name: Dragon Jump
description: Nibbs can double jump. Press the button in mid-air to jump again.
effects: Health: 1250; Movement: 7; Health Per Min: 600; Pills: Turbo; Jumps: 2; Jump Height: 6.6; Additional Jump Height: 5.5;

name: Precision Shot
description: Draw your bow and fire an arrow that will fly through terrain and explodes on impact with enemy Awesomenauts.
effects: Damage: 300; Cooldown: 7s; Range: 20 > 200;

name: Vengeance
description: Removes the movement penalty while shooting and adds a slow effect to your arrows for a set amount of time. Hitting enemies with your arrows increases the duration of vengeance.
effects: Duration: 5s; Extra duration per hit: 0.1s; Cooldown: 20s; Slowing Power Rapid Arrows: 15%; Slow Duration Rapid Arrows: 1s; Slowing Power Precise Shot: 20%; Slow Duration Precise Shot: 3.5s

name: Rapid Arrows
description: Fire rapid arrows that will change into slowing arrows while vengeance is active.
effects: Damage: 45; Damage Multiplier: 2; Arrows: 2; Attack Speed: 150; Range: 9;

name: Bird Hop
description: Bird hop. Hold the button to jump higher.
effects: Health: 1250; Movement: ?; Health Per Min: 600; Pills: Turbo; Jumps: 1; Jump Height: ?;
